summary: Imperial vampire, just to serve you.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Greetings, first of all english isn't my native language so sorry about mistakes. This is my first mod and every pieces of advice are welcome so don't hesitate :)[/size]
[center]__________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center][i][u][b][/b][/u][/i][color=#a61c00][size=5][i][b]Isabella Virgo[/b][/i][/size][/color]
__________________________________________________________________

[center][/center][img]http://sachacvs.netai.net/images/bgnexusisa.png[/img][/center]

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Requirements[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][size=3]Last Skyrim update[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii [/b](Female pack)[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3](and of course [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url])[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Highly recommended[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D5696&pUp=1]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament by [b]AmethystDeceiver[/b][/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE by [b]Caliente[/b][/url][/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Bugs[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][b][u]0[/u][/b] known at the moment.[/size]

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Location[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]She's waiting in [b]"[color=#ff7700]The Winking Skeever[/color]"[/b], in [color=#ff7700][b]Solitude[/b][/color].[/size]

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]About her[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
Name : Isabella Virgo
Class : One-handed assassin
Race :Â  Imperial Vampire
Lore : Nothing for the moment[/size]

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][size=3]Use [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color].[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]or
[/size][list][*][size=3]Extract the file into your [color=#ff7700][b]\Skyrim\Data[/b][/color] folder.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Permissions[/u][/b][/size][/color][/size]
[size=3]
[u]No reupload allowed[/u] unless you ask me first. Same If you want to use this mod to create your own and [u]publish it.[/u][/size]

[color=#a61c00][size=4][b][u]Updates[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3][color=#ff7700][b]1.0[/b][/color] Update of the follower[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
